item.title: Shiro is a local first supply chain network on a mission to create thriving regenerative food systems!
item.description: A multi stakeholder platform cooperative. Open source, owned and managed by all active participants, from local consumers to regional wholesalers. Shiro moves beyond food as a commodity and people as consumers. Participation on the platform means an active food citizenship to support the development of a democratic, socially and economically just, and environmentally regenerative food system. Shiro builds a new food system from the bottom up, not top down!
